c2d 0.0.9040
  • Reference
  • C2D Codebook

Add long country code to referendum data

Source: R/c2d.gen.R
add_country_code_long.Rd

Augments data with an additional column holding the current or former three-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 code of the country in which the referendum took place (see ISO 3166-3 for former country codes).

add_country_code_long(data)

Arguments

data

C2D referendum data as returned by rfrnds(). A data frame that at minimum contains the column country_code (with ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 or ISO 3166-3 alpha-4 codes).

Value

A tibble.

See also

Other referendum data augmentation functions: add_country_code_continual(), add_country_name_long(), add_country_name(), add_former_country_flag(), add_period(), add_turnout(), add_world_regions()

Examples

c2d::rfrnds(date_max = clock::date_today(zone = "UTC"),
            date_min = clock::date_today(zone = "UTC") |> clock::add_years(-1L)) |>
  c2d:::add_country_code_long() |>
  dplyr::select(any_of("id"),
                starts_with("country_"))
